meta.title: From RADIO to GAMMA
meta.author: Sandy Weisz and Mao Reynolds
meta.message: The electromagnetic spectrum is composed of seven types of waves: radio, microwave, infrared, visible, ultraviolet, x-ray and gamma ray. Radio has the lowest frequency while gamma has the highest. Radio waves were formerly known as Hertzian waves in honor of Heinrich Hertz, who proved the existence of electromagnetic radiation in the 1880s.
